channel.title: Star of the Day
channel.description: RSS feed of the star of the day.

item.title: Supernova Heights
item.description: Supernova Heights is a house on Steele's Road in the Belsize Park district of the London Borough of Camden. The terraced property is most known for being the home of Oasis singer songwriter Noel Gallagher in the late 90s, and as a place of 'non-stop party'. The house was named in allusion to Oasis's song "Champagne Supernova".
